name: Organish Seagreen
description:
Introducing our brand new flavour, Organish Seagreen (* Now With More Tasty Lead!)

Greee~n Cuisiii~ne

A subsidiary of Green Corp™️, your favourite brand that is also a colour.

----

Our ECO-PILOTS carefully clean the ocean floors of trash using our proprietary green-mechs that come with dual-wielding railguns! They make sure that every batch of Organish Seagreen is not only trash-free, but also fertilized with all-natural renewable material that gives Organish Seagreen its extra special flavour!

----

----

Mouse only. If you're stuck, click frantically on everything until you aren't.

5 min play time estimate.

110MB load size estimate.

Credits in-game.

Made in <2 weeks for #MechJam 3.

Windows download available, but not extensively tested, as the game was developed in WebGL mode.
